segments.text: Hey , Jack ! Is Jenny coming with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just asking ? ! Why is your face burning like mad ? Ah-huh , someone has a crush on Jenny , doesn't he ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , Ted ! Don't be such a chicken . If you like her , you ’ Ve got to tell her . Maybe she likes you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I don't have the guts to ask her out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you so afraid of ? Just tell her what you are feeling about her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ d totally die if she turned me down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But that's better than keeping everything to yourself . You ’ Ve got to let her know . Come on ! You ’ Ve got to take a chance . Even though you are rejected , it ’ s not the end of the world . There ’ s nothing to lose , is there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know .. Well , maybe you are right , but how am I gonna tell her ?
segments.speaker: S1
